description:
Yatterman wants Yatterwan back. A whipped man upsets his wife and gets locked out of the car. The natural shop gets a lesson on nature. Braiking Boss gives life lessons on Boyacky`s show.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yatterwan Becomes a House Pet?! / Noon Through the Power Windows / Natural Organic Boy / Boyacky`s Room
Yatterwan Kaiinu ni Naru!? / Power Window Goshi no Hiru / Natural Organic Danshi / Bojacky no Heya (Guest: Burai King Boss)
ヤッターワン飼い犬になる!? / パワーウインドウ越しの昼 / ナチュラルオーガニック男子 / ボヤッキーの部屋 (ゲスト: ブライキングボス)
